31 /** Class to static check signal mapping is valid */
32 template<class Info, int signalNum> class CheckSignal {
33 #ifdef DEBUG_BUILD
34  static_assert((signalNum<Info::numSignals), "Non-existent signal - Modify Configure.usbdm");
35  static_assert((signalNum>=Info::numSignals)||(Info::info[signalNum].gpioBit != UNMAPPED_PCR), "Signal is not mapped to a pin - Modify Configure.usbdm");
36  static_assert((signalNum>=Info::numSignals)||(Info::info[signalNum].gpioBit != INVALID_PCR), "Signal doesn't exist in this device/package");
37  static_assert((signalNum>=Info::numSignals)||((Info::info[signalNum].gpioBit == UNMAPPED_PCR)||(Info::info[signalNum].gpioBit == INVALID_PCR)||(Info::info[signalNum].gpioBit >= 0)), "Illegal signal");
38 #endif
39 };

377  /**
378  * Get MCGERCLK
379  *
380  * @return MCGERCLK as uint32_t
381  */
382  static uint32_t getErcClock() {
383 
384  switch((mcg->C7&MCG_C7_OSCSEL_MASK)) {
385  default : return 0;
386  case MCG_C7_OSCSEL(0) : return Osc0Info::getInternalClock();
387  case MCG_C7_OSCSEL(1) : return RtcInfo::getInternalClock();
388  }
389  }
390 
391  /**
392  * Get Internal MCGIRCLK (ungated by MCG_C1_IRCLKEN_MASK)
393  *
394  * @return MCGIRCLK as uint32_t
395  */
396  static uint32_t getInternalIrcClock() {
397  if (mcg->C2&MCG_C2_IRCS_MASK) {
398  #ifdef MCG_SC_FCRDIV_MASK
399  return (system_fast_irc_clock/(1<<((mcg->SC&MCG_SC_FCRDIV_MASK)>>MCG_SC_FCRDIV_SHIFT)));
400  #else
401  return system_fast_irc_clock;
402  #endif
403  }
404  else {
405  return system_slow_irc_clock;
406  }
407  }
408 
409  /**
410  * Get MCGIRCLK (gated by MCG_C1_IRCLKEN_MASK)
411  *
412  * @return MCGIRCLK as uint32_t
413  */
414  static uint32_t getMcgIrClock() {
415  if (mcg->C1&MCG_C1_IRCLKEN_MASK) {
416  return getInternalIrcClock();
417  }
418  else {
419  return 0;
420  }
421  }

441 class SimInfo {
442 public:
443  //! Hardware base pointer
444  static constexpr volatile SIM_Type *sim = (volatile SIM_Type *)SIM_BasePtr;
445 
446  //! Number of IRQs for hardware
447  static constexpr uint32_t irqCount = 0;
448 
449  // Template:sim_mk20d5
450 
451  //! System Options Register 1
452  static constexpr uint32_t sopt1 =
453  SIM_SOPT1_OSC32KSEL(2); // 32K oscillator clock select
454 
455  /**
456  * Get ERCLK32K clock frequency
457  *
458  * @return Clock frequency as a uint32_t in Hz
459  */
460  static uint32_t getErc32kClock() {
461 
462  switch(sim->SOPT1&SIM_SOPT1_OSC32KSEL_MASK) {
463  default : return 0;
464  case SIM_SOPT1_OSC32KSEL(0) : return Osc0Info::getOsc32kClock();
465  case SIM_SOPT1_OSC32KSEL(2) : return RtcInfo::getExternalClock();
466  case SIM_SOPT1_OSC32KSEL(3) : return 1000;
467  }
468  }
469 
470  //! System Options Register 2
471  static constexpr uint32_t sopt2 =
472  SIM_SOPT2_PTD7PAD(0) | // PTD7 pad drive strength
473  SIM_SOPT2_USBSRC(1) | // USB clock source select
474  SIM_SOPT2_PLLFLLSEL(1) | // PLL/FLL clock select
475  SIM_SOPT2_CLKOUTSEL(6) | // CLKOUT pin clock source select
476  SIM_SOPT2_RTCCLKOUTSEL(1); // RTC clock out select
477 
478  /**
479  * Get Peripheral clock frequency
480  *
481  * @return Clock frequency as a uint32_t in Hz
482  */
483  static uint32_t getPeripheralClock() {
484 
485  switch(sim->SOPT2&SIM_SOPT2_PLLFLLSEL_MASK) {
486  default: return 0;
487  case SIM_SOPT2_PLLFLLSEL(0): return SystemMcgFllClock;
488  case SIM_SOPT2_PLLFLLSEL(1): return SystemMcgPllClock;
489  }
490  }
491 
492  //! System Options Register 4
493  static constexpr uint32_t sopt4 =
494  SIM_SOPT4_FTM0TRG0SRC(0) | // FlexTimer 0 Hardware Trigger 0 Source Select
495  SIM_SOPT4_FTM1CLKSEL(0) | // FlexTimer 1 External Clock Pin Select
496  SIM_SOPT4_FTM0CLKSEL(0) | // FlexTimer 0 External Clock Pin Select
497  SIM_SOPT4_FTM1CH0SRC(0) | // FTM1 channel 0 input capture source select
498  SIM_SOPT4_FTM1FLT0(0) | // FlexTimer 1 Fault 0 Select
499  SIM_SOPT4_FTM0FLT1(0) | // FlexTimer 0 Fault 1 Select
500  SIM_SOPT4_FTM0FLT0(0); // FlexTimer 0 Fault 0 Select
501 
502  //! System Options Register 5
503  static constexpr uint32_t sopt5 =
504  SIM_SOPT5_UART0TXSRC(0) | // UART 0 transmit data source select
505  SIM_SOPT5_UART0RXSRC(0) | // UART 0 receive data source select
506  SIM_SOPT5_UART1TXSRC(0) | // UART 1 transmit data source select
507  SIM_SOPT5_UART1RXSRC(0); // UART 1 receive data source select
508 
509  //! System Options Register 7
510  static constexpr uint32_t sopt7 =
511  SIM_SOPT7_ADC0ALTTRGEN(0) | // ADC0 alternate trigger enable
512  SIM_SOPT7_ADC0PRETRGSEL(0) | // ADC0 pretrigger select
513  SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(0); // ADC0 trigger select
514 
515  //! System Clock Divider Register 1
516  static constexpr uint32_t clkdiv1 =
517  SIM_CLKDIV1_OUTDIV4(3)| // Flash clock
518  SIM_CLKDIV1_OUTDIV2(1)| // Bus clock
519  SIM_CLKDIV1_OUTDIV1(1); // Core/system clock
520 
521  //! System Clock Divider Register 2
522  static constexpr uint32_t clkdiv2 =
523  2; // USB clock divider divisor & fraction
524 
525  /**
526  * Get USB clock frequency
527  *
528  * @return Clock frequency as a uint32_t in Hz
529  */
530  static uint32_t getUsbClock() {
531  return (getPeripheralClock()*
532  (((sim->CLKDIV2&SIM_CLKDIV2_USBFRAC_MASK)>>SIM_CLKDIV2_USBFRAC_SHIFT)+1))/
533  (((sim->CLKDIV2&SIM_CLKDIV2_USBDIV_MASK)>>SIM_CLKDIV2_USBDIV_SHIFT)+1);
534  }
535 
536  /**
537  * Initialise SIM registers
538  */
539  static void initRegs() {
540 
541  #ifdef SIM_SCGC4_USBOTG_MASK
542  // The USB interface must be disabled for clock changes to have effect
543  sim->SCGC4 &= ~SIM_SCGC4_USBOTG_MASK;
544  #endif
545 
546  sim->SOPT1 = sopt1;
547  sim->SOPT2 = sopt2;
548  sim->SOPT4 = sopt4;
549  sim->SOPT5 = sopt5;
550  sim->SOPT7 = sopt7;
551 
552  sim->CLKDIV1 = clkdiv1;
553  sim->CLKDIV2 = clkdiv2;
554  }

556  /**
557  * Select the ADC0 Trigger source in STOP and VLPS modes, or when ADC0 Alternative Trigger is active.
558  */
559  enum SimAdc0Trigger {
560  SimAdc0Trigger_PdbExTrig = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(0), //!< External Trigger Source PDBx_EXTRG
561  SimAdc0Trigger_Cmp0 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(1), //!< Comparator 0
562  SimAdc0Trigger_Cmp1 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(2), //!< Comparator 1
563  SimAdc0Trigger_3 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(3), //!< Reserved
564  SimAdc0Trigger_PitCh0 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(4), //!< PIT Channel 0
565  SimAdc0Trigger_PitCh1 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(5), //!< PIT Channel 1
566  SimAdc0Trigger_PitCh2 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(6), //!< PIT Channel 2
567  SimAdc0Trigger_PitCh3 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(7), //!< PIT Channel 3
568  SimAdc0Trigger_Ftm0 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(8), //!< FTM0 Init and Ext Trigger Outputs
569  SimAdc0Trigger_Ftm1 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(9), //!< FTM1 Init and Ext Trigger Outputs
570  SimAdc0Trigger_Ftm2 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(10), //!< FTM2 Init and Ext Trigger Outputs (if present)
571  SimAdc0Trigger_Ftm3 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(11), //!< FTM3 Init and Ext Trigger Outputs (if present)
572  SimAdc0Trigger_RtcAlarm = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(12), //!< RTC Alarm
573  SimAdc0Trigger_RtcSeconds = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(13), //!< RTC Seconds
574  SimAdc0Trigger_Lptrm = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(14), //!< LPTMR
575  SimAdc0Trigger_15 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0TRGSEL(15), //!< Reserved
576  };

578  /**
579  * Select the ADC0 Alternative Trigger sources.
580  * If PDB is selected then Pre-trigger 0/1 is determined by the PDB setup
581  * otherwise Pre-trigger 0/1 is determined by this selection.
582  */
583  enum SimAdc0AltTrigger {
584  SimAdc0AltTrigger_Pdb = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0ALTTRGEN(0), //!< PDB trigger
585  SimAdc0AltTrigger_PreTrigger_0 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0ALTTRGEN(1)|SIM_SOPT7_ADC0PRETRGSEL(0), //!< Pre-trigger 0 = A (SC1[0])
586  SimAdc0AltTrigger_PreTrigger_1 = SIM_SOPT7_ADC0ALTTRGEN(1)|SIM_SOPT7_ADC0PRETRGSEL(1), //!< Pre-trigger 1 = B (SC1[1])
587  };
588 
589  /**
590  * Select the ADC0 Trigger source
591  *
592  * If PDB is selected by SimAdc0Trigger then Pre-trigger 0/1 is determined by the PDB setup,
593  * otherwise Pre-trigger 0/1 is determined by this parameter.
594  * For example, setAdc0Triggers(SimAdc0AltTrigger_PreTrigger_1, SimAdc0Trigger_PitCh0) will set the trigger source
595  * to PIT channel 0 and conversion will use SC1[1]/R[1].
596  *
597  * @param[in] simAdc0AltTrigger Select the ADC0 Alternative Trigger sources
598  * @param[in] simAdc0Trigger Select the ADC0 Trigger source in STOP and VLPS modes, or when ADC0 Alternative Trigger is active.
599  */
600  static void setAdc0Triggers(SimAdc0AltTrigger simAdc0AltTrigger, SimAdc0Trigger simAdc0Trigger=SimAdc0Trigger_PdbExTrig) {
601  sim->SOPT7 = simAdc0Trigger|simAdc0AltTrigger;
602  };

1626  /**
1627  * Get input clock frequency
1628  *
1629  * @return Input clock frequency as an uint32_t in Hz
1630  */
1631  static uint32_t getInputClockFrequency() {
1632 
1633  switch(ftm->SC&FTM_SC_CLKS_MASK) {
1634  default:
1635  case FTM_SC_CLKS(0): return 0;
1636  case FTM_SC_CLKS(1): return SystemBusClock;
1637  case FTM_SC_CLKS(2): return SystemMcgffClock;
1638  case FTM_SC_CLKS(3): return ftmExternalClock;
1639  }
1640  }

1643  * Get clock frequency
1644  *
1645  * @return Frequency as a float in Hz
1646  */
1647  static float getClockFrequencyF() {
1648 
1649  float freq = getInputClockFrequency();
1650  return freq/(1<<((ftm->SC&FTM_SC_PS_MASK)>>FTM_SC_PS_SHIFT));
1651  }
1652 
1653  /**
1654  * Get clock frequency
1655  *
1656  * @return Frequency as a uint32_t in Hz (may underflow)
1657  */
1658  static uint32_t getClockFrequency() {
1659 
1660  uint32_t freq = getInputClockFrequency();
1661  return freq/(1<<((ftm->SC&FTM_SC_PS_MASK)>>FTM_SC_PS_SHIFT));
1662  }

1690  ((PORT_Type *)PORTC_BasePtr)->GPCLR = pcrValue|PORT_PCR_MUX(4)|PORT_GPCLR_GPWE(0x0018UL);

1692  }

1696  */

1700  ((PORT_Type *)PORTA_BasePtr)->GPCLR = PORT_PCR_MUX(0)|PORT_GPCLR_GPWE(0x16U);
1701  ((PORT_Type *)PORTC_BasePtr)->GPCLR = PORT_PCR_MUX(0)|PORT_GPCLR_GPWE(0x18U);
1702  ((PORT_Type *)PORTD_BasePtr)->GPCLR = PORT_PCR_MUX(0)|PORT_GPCLR_GPWE(0x30U);
1703  }

1816 
1817  float freq = getInputClockFrequency();
1818  return freq/(1<<((ftm->SC&FTM_SC_PS_MASK)>>FTM_SC_PS_SHIFT));
1819  }
1820 
1821  /**
1822  * Get clock frequency
1823  *
1824  * @return Frequency as a uint32_t in Hz (may underflow)
1825  */
1826  static uint32_t getClockFrequency() {
1827 
1828  uint32_t freq = getInputClockFrequency();
1829  return freq/(1<<((ftm->SC&FTM_SC_PS_MASK)>>FTM_SC_PS_SHIFT));
1830  }

2499  /**
2500  * Get clock frequency
2501  *
2502  * @return Frequency as a float in Hz
2503  */
2504  static float getClockFrequencyF() {
2505 
2506  float freq = getInputClockFrequency();
2507  if (lptmr->PSR&LPTMR_PSR_PBYP_MASK) {
2508  return freq;
2509  }
2510  return freq/(1<<(((lptmr->PSR&LPTMR_PSR_PRESCALE_MASK)>>LPTMR_PSR_PRESCALE_SHIFT)+1));
2511  }

3043  static uint32_t getInputClockFrequency() {
3044  switch(tsi->SCANC&TSI_SCANC_AMCLKS_MASK) {
3045  case TSI_SCANC_AMCLKS(0): return 1000;
3046  case TSI_SCANC_AMCLKS(1): return McgInfo::getMcgIrClock();
3047  case TSI_SCANC_AMCLKS(2): return Osc0Info::getOscerClock();
3048  }
3049  return 0;
3050  }

3053  * Get input clock when configured in low power mode

3056  */

3059  case TSI_GENCS_LPCLKS(0): return 1000;
3060  case TSI_GENCS_LPCLKS(1): return SimInfo::getErc32kClock();
3061  }
3062  return 0;
3063  }
